Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央向陽葵講述了自己計劃的當前進度。陽葵對莉央計劃的高明表示認可、“或許是對的”，但仍不同意莉央的本來目的。陽葵表示莉央“頭也不回”的特質既是優點也是缺點，並反問莉央“是否有與其他人交談過”。莉央正在迷惑之際，監獄突然遭到攻擊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央向日鞠讲述了自己计划的当前进度。日鞠对莉央计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意莉央的本来目的。日鞠表示莉央“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问莉央“是否有与其他人交谈过”。莉央正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央向阳葵讲述了自己计划的当前进度。阳葵对莉央计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意莉央的本来目的。阳葵表示莉央“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问莉央“是否有与其他人交谈过”。莉央正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央向阳葵讲述了自己计划的当前进度。阳葵对莉央计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意莉央的本来目的。阳葵表示莉央“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问莉央“是否有与其他人交谈过”。莉央正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。

desc.en: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her consideration. It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.jp: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her consideration. It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.thai: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her consideration. It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.ko: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her consideration. It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央大為震驚，懷疑究竟是誰脫離了她的計算。原來是陽葵社團裡的後輩英美前來救援，雖然理由僅僅是為了和部長共享布丁。英美承認這麼做對其他人意義並不是很大，但陽葵則表示她信任她的後輩們。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央大为震惊，怀疑究竟是谁脱离了她的计算。原来是日鞠社团里的后辈艾米前来救援，虽然理由仅仅是为了和部长共享布丁。艾米承认这么做对其他人意义并不是很大，但日鞠则表示她信任她的后辈们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央大为震惊，怀疑究竟是谁脱离了她的计算。原来是阳葵社团里的后辈英美前来救援，虽然理由仅仅是为了和部长共享布丁。英美承认这么做对其他人意义并不是很大，但阳葵则表示她信任她的后辈们。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央大为震惊，怀疑究竟是谁脱离了她的计算。原来是阳葵社团里的后辈英美前来救援，虽然理由仅仅是为了和部长共享布丁。英美承认这么做对其他人意义并不是很大，但阳葵则表示她信任她的后辈们。

desc.en: As the Veritas were frustrated by the fact that the communication was cut off unexpectedly and unable to connect, everyone found a screen monitor was doing something.
desc.jp: As the Veritas were frustrated by the fact that the communication was cut off unexpectedly and unable to connect, everyone found a screen monitor was doing something.

desc.zh_tw: 就在貝里塔斯因通訊被意外中斷、無論如何都無法連線上，無從下手而抓狂時，所有人卻突然發現螢幕有了動靜。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在贝里塔斯因通讯被意外中断、无论如何都无法连接上，无从下手而抓狂时，所有人却突然发现屏幕有了动静。

desc.en: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.
desc.jp: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.
desc.thai: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.
desc.ko: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.
desc.zh_tw: 千尋在堇的協助下，取得了位於扣押品保管所的「鏡子」，成功掌握了埃裡都的網路。遊戲開發部將此當作契機展開了反擊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 千寻在堇的协助下，取得了位于扣押品保管所的「镜子」，成功掌握了埃里都的网络。游戏开发部将此当作契机展开了反击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 千寻在堇的协助下，取得了位于扣押品保管所的「镜子」，成功掌握了埃里都的网络。游戏开发部将此当作契机展开了反击。

desc.en: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.zh_tw: 因為工程師部的活躍表現，遊戲開發部成功擊倒了前衛君。但工程師部也因此必須退場了。遊戲開發部在倒下的工程師部的應援下繼續向前邁進。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为工程师部的活跃表现，游戏开发部成功击倒了前卫君。但工程师部也因此必须退场了。游戏开发部在倒下的工程师部的应援下继续向前迈进。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为工程师部的活跃表现，游戏开发部成功击倒了前卫君。但工程师部也因此必须退场了。游戏开发部在倒下的工程师部的应援下继续向前迈进。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为工程师部的活跃表现，游戏开发部成功击倒了前卫君。但工程师部也因此必须退场了。游戏开发部在倒下的工程师部的应援下继续向前迈进。

desc.en: Chihiro's appearance made everyone very excited. Others at Veritas also connected to the comm. Hare was very curious about how Chihiro did it, and Chihiro said lightly that it was the "Mirror" came in handy. Everyone remembered the confrontation between Yuzu and Neru at that time, and was amazed by the plan. Momoi questioned the means of retrieving it, and Sumire happened to connect to the comm. Despite the successful hacking, the firewall started making the communication unstable. Veritas promised that the communication would not be interrupted, and everyone continued to combat the Avant Guard.

desc.zh_tw: 千尋的出現讓大家振奮無比。貝里塔斯也連上了通訊。晴很好奇千尋是怎麼做到的，而千尋則輕鬆地表示是之前被沒收的“鏡子”派上了用場。眾人想起了當時柚子與寧瑠的交鋒，在場所有人無一不對這一計劃驚歎不已。桃井對如何取得表示疑問，而堇這時正好接入通訊。雖然成功駭入，但防火牆又使得通訊不穩定起來；貝里塔斯保證了通訊不再會被中斷，所有人則繼續迎戰前衛君。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 千寻的出现让大家振奋无比。贝里塔斯也连上了通讯。晴很好奇千寻是怎么做到的，而千寻则轻松地表示是之前被没收的“镜子”派上了用场。众人想起了当时柚子与尼禄的交锋，在场所有人无一不对这一计划惊叹不已。桃井对如何取得表示疑问，而堇这时正好接入通讯。虽然成功骇入，但防火墙又使得通讯不稳定起来；贝里塔斯保证了通讯不再会被中断，所有人则继续迎战前卫君。

desc.en: The Engineering Department put their "loudspeaker", a device that had been making for a half year and uncountable money, into use, and the result was amazing. Yet the Engineering Department collapsed due to physical limitations. Sensei and GDD continued to move forward under the guidance of Chihiro.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department put their "loudspeaker", a device that had been making for a half year and uncountable money, into use, and the result was amazing. Yet the Engineering Department collapsed due to physical limitations. Sensei and GDD continued to move forward under the guidance of Chihiro.

Yet the Engineering Department collapsed due to physical limitations. Sensei and GDD continued to move forward under the guidance of Chihiro.
desc.zh_tw: 工程部將自己花了半年和無數資金研發的揚聲器兼炸彈投入了使用，結果效果良好，“響度”極佳。然而工程部此時也因體力不支倒下，只剩下老師與遊戲開發部繼續前進。千尋繼續為眾人帶路。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部将自己花了半年和无数资金研发的扬声器兼炸弹投入了使用，结果效果良好，“响度”极佳。然而工程部此时也因体力不支倒下，只剩下老师与游戏开发部继续前进。千寻继续为众人带路。

desc.en: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.jp: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.thai: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.ko: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.zh_tw: C&C的成員以超乎預期的活躍表現擊退了季，遊戲開發部終於聚集在埃裡都的中央之塔前。但季再次現身，他在莉央的許可下啟動了決戰兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了时，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但时再次现身，他在莉央的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了季，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但季再次现身，他在莉央的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了季，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但季再次现身，他在莉央的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。

desc.en: Neru was entangled with Toki. Toki found that Neru was no easy opponent and was surprised to see that much of Neru's actions had escaped the calculations - the data were updating in real time and barely usable. Meanwhile, other members escaped the maze set by Toki and joined the combat. Rio instructed Toki to retreat temporally. As Toki went nowhere, C&C decided to assemble with Sensei first.
desc.jp: Neru was entangled with Toki. Toki found that Neru was no easy opponent and was surprised to see that much of Neru's actions had escaped the calculations - the data were updating in real time and barely usable. Meanwhile, other members escaped the maze set by Toki and joined the combat. Rio instructed Toki to retreat temporally. As Toki went nowhere, C&C decided to assemble with Sensei first.

Meanwhile, other members escaped the maze set by Toki and joined the combat. Rio instructed Toki to retreat temporally. As Toki went nowhere, C&C decided to assemble with Sensei first.
desc.zh_tw: 時與寧瑠糾纏著。時發現寧瑠並非一個容易對付的對手，並驚訝的發現寧瑠的很多都逃脫了計算，資料基本上是實時更新而幾乎無法使用。與此同時，C&C的其他成員也從季設下的迷宮中走出，加入戰鬥。莉央此時指示時暫時撤退。因為時跑掉了，C&C決定先與老師集合。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时与尼禄纠缠着。时发现尼禄并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现尼禄的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从时设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉央此时指示时暂时撤退。因为时跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 时与宁瑠纠缠着。时发现宁瑠并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现宁瑠的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从季设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉央此时指示时暂时撤退。因为时跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时与宁瑠纠缠着。时发现宁瑠并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现宁瑠的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从季设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉央此时指示时暂时撤退。因为时跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.thai: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.ko: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: With Chihiro's guidance, the GDD arrived at the entrance of the tower and met the C&C. The two teams exchanged a few. Sensei confirmed the situation with Chihiro, but Toki appeared at this moment.
desc.jp: With Chihiro's guidance, the GDD arrived at the entrance of the tower and met the C&C. The two teams exchanged a few. Sensei confirmed the situation with Chihiro, but Toki appeared at this moment.
desc.thai: With Chihiro's guidance, the GDD arrived at the entrance of the tower and met the C&C. The two teams exchanged a few. Sensei confirmed the situation with Chihiro, but Toki appeared at this moment.
desc.ko: With Chihiro's guidance, the GDD arrived at the entrance of the tower and met the C&C. The two teams exchanged a few. Sensei confirmed the situation with Chihiro, but Toki appeared at this moment.
desc.zh_tw: 在千尋的指引下，遊戲開發部一行人順利來到了中心高塔的入口，正好遇到同樣前來的C&C。兩隊間交換了下具體情況。老師向千尋再次確認情報的準確性，但此刻季突然再次現身。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在千寻的指引下，游戏开发部一行人顺利来到了中心高塔的入口，正好遇到同样前来的C&C。两队间交换了下具体情况。老师向千寻再次确认情报的准确性，但此刻时突然再次现身。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在千寻的指引下，游戏开发部一行人顺利来到了中心高塔的入口，正好遇到同样前来的C&C。两队间交换了下具体情况。老师向千寻再次确认情报的准确性，但此刻季突然再次现身。

desc.en: Toki said they had already changed the plan, allowing Toki to use Abi-Eshuh, an exoskeleton suit. It fell from the sky, and Toki entered it like nothing. Toki started the system, and C&C began to engage.
desc.jp: Toki said they had already changed the plan, allowing Toki to use Abi-Eshuh, an exoskeleton suit. It fell from the sky, and Toki entered it like nothing. Toki started the system, and C&C began to engage.
desc.thai: Toki said they had already changed the plan, allowing Toki to use Abi-Eshuh, an exoskeleton suit. It fell from the sky, and Toki entered it like nothing. Toki started the system, and C&C began to engage.
desc.ko: Toki said they had already changed the plan, allowing Toki to use Abi-Eshuh, an exoskeleton suit. It fell from the sky, and Toki entered it like nothing. Toki started the system, and C&C began to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央表示他們已經改變了計劃，允許時使用Abi-Eshuh，一套外骨骼機甲。機甲應聲從天而降，季也熟練地進入了機甲，啟動了系統。C&C立刻開始應敵。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央表示他们已经改变了计划，允许时使用Abi-Eshuh，一套外骨骼机甲。机甲应声从天而降，时也熟练地进入了机甲，启动了系统。C&C立刻开始应敌。

desc.en: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.jp: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.thai: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.ko: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.zh_tw: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力讓大家都相當驚訝。在朱音的建議下，老師和寧瑠找出了弱點，企圖把戰鬥引導為空中戰。但季似乎早已預料到這一點，活躍的表現讓寧瑠受到重傷，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在茜的建议下，老师和尼禄找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但时似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让尼禄受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在朱音的建议下，老师和宁瑠找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但季似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让宁瑠受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在朱音的建议下，老师和宁瑠找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但季似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让宁瑠受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。

desc.en: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.
desc.jp: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.

On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.
desc.ko: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.
desc.zh_tw: C&C沒對這個機甲造成一點傷害，千尋報告了這點。同時千尋還注意到，都市的全部電力和算力都集中在了這套機甲上，使它幾乎甚至可以確定未來。聽聞此話的遊戲開發部眾人紛紛表示“這不和作弊一樣？！”老師對此毫無辦法，而這時朱音突然指出，這套裝甲是為地面作戰設計。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千寻报告了这点。同时千寻还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的游戏开发部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时茜突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千寻报告了这点。同时千寻还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的游戏开发部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时朱音突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千寻报告了这点。同时千寻还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的游戏开发部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时朱音突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。

desc.en: Sensei realized something all of a sudden, commanding Neru to get to the rooftop. Rio said it was useless to do so, but Sensei didn't respond. Toki fired at Neru and blew up the rooftop, as the two falling down from the top.
desc.jp: Sensei realized something all of a sudden, commanding Neru to get to the rooftop. Rio said it was useless to do so, but Sensei didn't respond. Toki fired at Neru and blew up the rooftop, as the two falling down from the top.

desc.zh_tw: 老師突然意識到了什麼，命令寧瑠將戰場轉移到房頂上。莉央表示轉移到樓頂同樣沒有，但老師笑而不語。季向寧瑠開炮，炸掉了房頂，兩人從空中摔落。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令尼禄将战场转移到房顶上。莉央表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。时向尼禄开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令宁瑠将战场转移到房顶上。莉央表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。季向宁瑠开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令宁瑠将战场转移到房顶上。莉央表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。季向宁瑠开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。

desc.en: 老师的意图此时终于表现出来：既然是为地面作战设计，在空中又怎么样呢？事实证明的确如此。虽然只有一瞬间的时间，但柚子已经完全注意到了其弱点所在。Sensei finally revealed the true intent: if it was designed to battle on the ground, then how about falling from the sky? The fact proved it right. Though only in a flash, Yuzu had already spotted its weakness.

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.jp: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.thai: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.ko: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠最終還是沒能勝利。莉央指示時回收老師，但此時機體卻出現了一絲破綻，千尋讓桃井抓住機會對其攻擊，成功讓眾人先行撤退。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄最终还是没能胜利。莉央指示时回收老师，但此时机体却出现了一丝破绽，千寻让桃井抓住机会对其攻击，成功让众人先行撤退。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠最终还是没能胜利。莉央指示时回收老师，但此时机体却出现了一丝破绽，千寻让桃井抓住机会对其攻击，成功让众人先行撤退。

desc.en: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.jp: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.thai: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.ko: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.zh_tw: 情況陷入絕望。正當大家灰心喪氣之際，仔細觀察寧瑠與季戰鬥的柚子挺身而出，提出能讓「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察尼禄与时战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察宁瑠与季战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察宁瑠与季战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。

desc.en: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro concluded the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.jp: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro concluded the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.thai: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro concluded the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.ko: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro concluded the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.zh_tw: 所有人撤退到了一幢較近的建築物中。千尋總結，C&C還不夠強，而且寧瑠尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已經累趴下了，而遊戲開發部的戰力甚至算不上什麼。大家都認為一切方法已經耗盡，所有人最不想見到的“Bad Ending”，如綠所言，已然到來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且尼禄尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且宁瑠尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且宁瑠尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。

desc.en: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity.
desc.jp: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity.
desc.thai: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity.
desc.ko: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠一聽“Bad Ending”突然就醒了過來。寧瑠強行支撐著，質問遊戲開發部的人“就只有這點決心嗎”，表示雖然受重傷，但同大家一樣，不能就此放棄、白費。而當桃井問出要如何應對時的時候，柚子講述了自己的發現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。尼禄强行支撑着，质问游戏开发部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃井问出要如何应对时的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。宁瑠强行支撑着，质问游戏开发部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃井问出要如何应对时的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 宁瑠一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。宁瑠强行支撑着，质问游戏开发部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃井问出要如何应对时的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。

desc.en: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage to Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then had a plan.
desc.jp: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage to Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then had a plan.
desc.thai: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage to Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then had a plan.
desc.ko: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage to Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then had a plan.
desc.zh_tw: 柚子確信寧瑠對季造成了傷害。千尋指出，季的機甲似乎無法同時計算墜落時的引數與攻擊引數，此時便出現了破綻。柚子詢問寧瑠是否是在近距離作戰時最優，寧瑠表達了肯定，而柚子則有了個計劃——他們可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子确信尼禄对时造成了伤害。千寻指出，时的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问尼禄是否是在近距离作战时最优，尼禄表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子确信宁瑠对季造成了伤害。千寻指出，季的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问宁瑠是否是在近距离作战时最优，宁瑠表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子确信宁瑠对季造成了伤害。千寻指出，季的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问宁瑠是否是在近距离作战时最优，宁瑠表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。

desc.en: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.
desc.jp: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.
desc.thai: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.
desc.ko: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.
desc.zh_tw: 因為大家齊心協力的關係，千年的學生成功擊敗了季，代號Double O的寧瑠的活躍表現也爭取到了最後的勝利。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千年的学生成功击败了时，代号Double O的尼禄的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千年的学生成功击败了季，代号Double O的宁瑠的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千年的学生成功击败了季，代号Double O的宁瑠的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。

desc.en: C&C continued the fight with Toki's suit. Toki started out being very confident, but soon she discovered that her attacks seemed to be ineffective as well. C&C began to organize the battle with intution, and finally forced Toki into the building.
desc.jp: C&C continued the fight with Toki's suit. Toki started out being very confident, but soon she discovered that her attacks seemed to be ineffective as well. C&C began to organize the battle with intution, and finally forced Toki into the building.

desc.ko: C&C continued the fight with Toki's suit. Toki started out being very confident, but soon she discovered that her attacks seemed to be ineffective as well. C&C began to organize the battle with intution, and finally forced Toki into the building.
desc.zh_tw: C&C一行人繼續與季和她的機甲戰鬥。季起初非常自信，但很快發現自己的攻擊似乎也開始無效化。C&C開始以直覺統籌戰鬥，最終將時逼進了室內。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C一行人继续与时和她的机甲战斗。时起初非常自信，但很快发现自己的攻击似乎也开始无效化。C&C开始以直觉统筹战斗，最终将时逼进了室内。

desc.en: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.jp: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.thai: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.ko: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人都對柚子的假設與計劃表示懷疑，但寧瑠不僅表示了肯定，而且還誇讚了她曾經為救朋友所表現出的無謂氣魄。朱音擔心寧瑠身上的傷，但後者表示單靠毅力就能支撐。最終所有人同意此次作戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人都对柚子的假设与计划表示怀疑，但尼禄不仅表示了肯定，而且还夸赞了她曾经为救朋友所表现出的无谓气魄。茜担心尼禄身上的伤，但后者表示单靠毅力就能支撑。最终所有人同意此次作战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人都对柚子的假设与计划表示怀疑，但宁瑠不仅表示了肯定，而且还夸赞了她曾经为救朋友所表现出的无谓气魄。朱音担心宁瑠身上的伤，但后者表示单靠毅力就能支撑。最终所有人同意此次作战。

desc.en: Rio was very confused by the Sensei's strategy, but soon realized what it was. Rio authorized Toki to fire the main gun to knock down Neru. Dust settled, even Rio was surprised by her own irrational choice, but still claimed that the probability of Sensei's winning was nearly zero. She didn't understand why anyone would keep fighting with that in mind, but Akane explained it clear and loud: Sensei never, and ever, talked about the probability of winning.
desc.jp: Rio was very confused by the Sensei's strategy, but soon realized what it was. Rio authorized Toki to fire the main gun to knock down Neru. desc.zh_tw: 莉央對老師的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意識到了什麼。莉央授權時發射主炮，將寧瑠打倒。塵埃落定，就連莉央也對自己非理性的選擇感到驚訝，並且同時繼續嘴硬聲稱老師成功的概率為零，並對所有人在此種條件下仍繼續作戰感到不解。朱音則解釋稱，老師從來，以及他們作戰，從來就沒有談過勝率云云。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉央授权时发射主炮，将尼禄打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉央也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。茜则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉央授权时发射主炮，将宁瑠打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉央也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。朱音则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。

name.en: As Long As She Got Rescued
name.jp: As Long As She Got Rescued
name.thai: As Long As She Got Rescued
name.ko: As Long As She Got Rescued

desc.en: Akane was still very worried about Neru's physical conditions, but Neru simply didn't care. All she wanted is to rescue Aris - and when Aris' rescued, they won. Akane was surprised by this, but expressed her understanding, saying they were just like "the protagonists in a game". Akane also mentioned that Neru had a code name "OO" as well - a victory symbol for Millennium.
desc.jp: Akane was still very worried about Neru's physical conditions, but Neru simply didn't care. All she wanted is to rescue Aris - and when Aris' rescued, they won. Akane was surprised by this, but expressed her understanding, saying they were just like "the protagonists in a game". Akane also mentioned that Neru had a code name "OO" as well - a victory symbol for Millennium.

Akane was surprised by this, but expressed her understanding, saying they were just like "the protagonists in a game". Akane also mentioned that Neru had a code name "OO" as well - a victory symbol for Millennium.
desc.zh_tw: 朱音仍然對寧瑠的身體狀況非常擔心，表示千尋說的“勝率很低”的確沒錯。但寧瑠並不管這些，她只想救出愛麗絲——而且只要能救出就是勝利。朱音對此感到驚訝，不過表示理解，並且表示他們“就好像遊戲的主人公一樣”。朱音同時還向莉央提到，寧瑠可是有代號為“OO”——千年象徵勝利的——這樣的稱呼。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜仍然对尼禄的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但尼禄并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。茜对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。茜同时还向莉央提到，尼禄可是有代号为“OO”——千年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音仍然对宁瑠的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但宁瑠并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。朱音对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。朱音同时还向莉央提到，宁瑠可是有代号为“OO”——千年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 朱音仍然对宁瑠的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但宁瑠并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。朱音对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。朱音同时还向莉央提到，宁瑠可是有代号为“OO”——千年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。

desc.en: Neru got up from the ground, and Veritas had successfully hacked the freight elevator. They forced Toki into the elevator - a thing that Momoi had proposed before. It was only then that Rio realized their plan - to use the elevator to ineffective the system - but was too late. With the acceleration speed of 10x the gravity, Toki was no way winning. Rio was impressed by "OO".

desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠從地上爬起，貝里塔斯也已經成功駭入貨梯。眾人將時逼進貨梯——正是桃井曾提出的遊戲方案。這時莉央才意識到了眾人的計劃——用電梯來壓制系統——但為時已晚。在貝里塔斯特別設定的十倍重力加速度下，季和她的機甲直接被吊打。莉央感慨“OO”的強大。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄从地上爬起，贝里塔斯也已经成功骇入货梯。众人将时逼进货梯——正是桃井曾提出的游戏方案。这时莉央才意识到了众人的计划——用电梯来压制系统——但为时已晚。在贝里塔斯特别设定的十倍重力加速度下，时和她的机甲直接被吊打。莉央感慨“OO”的强大。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠从地上爬起，贝里塔斯也已经成功骇入货梯。众人将时逼进货梯——正是桃井曾提出的游戏方案。这时莉央才意识到了众人的计划——用电梯来压制系统——但为时已晚。在贝里塔斯特别设定的十倍重力加速度下，季和她的机甲直接被吊打。莉央感慨“OO”的强大。

desc.en: The Game Development Department arrives at Rio's location and are about to rescue Aris when an unknown being, Key, appears and takes control of Eridu. The results are catastrophic. Rio belatedly tries to sacrifice herself in an attempt to rectify the situation when Noa and Yuuka arrive.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department arrives at Rio's location and are about to rescue Aris when an unknown being, Key, appears and takes control of Eridu. The results are catastrophic. Rio belatedly tries to sacrifice herself in an attempt to rectify the situation when Noa and Yuuka arrive.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部抵達莉央所在的地方，在準備救出愛麗絲的瞬間，未來的存在「Key」出現且掌控了埃裡都，局勢因此開始步向危機。就在莉央準備犧牲自己來挽回一切時，乃愛和優香出現了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部抵达莉央所在的地方，在准备救出爱丽丝的瞬间，未来的存在「Key」出现且掌控了埃里都，局势因此开始步向危机。就在莉央准备牺牲自己来挽回一切时，诺亚和优香出现了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部抵达莉央所在的地方，在准备救出爱丽丝的瞬间，未来的存在「Key」出现且掌控了埃里都，局势因此开始步向危机。就在莉央准备牺牲自己来挽回一切时，乃爱和优香出现了。

desc.en: Neru was at her limits after suppressing Toki, and the GDD promised to her that they were sure to bring Aris back.
desc.jp: Neru was at her limits after suppressing Toki, and the GDD promised to her that they were sure to bring Aris back.

desc.ko: Neru was at her limits after suppressing Toki, and the GDD promised to her that they were sure to bring Aris back.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠成功壓制時。因為身體透支，要求遊戲開發部一定要將愛麗絲帶回來。遊戲開發部三人做了保證。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄成功压制时。因为身体透支，要求游戏开发部一定要将爱丽丝带回来。游戏开发部三人做了保证。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。
desc.zh_tw: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).

desc.en: Rio showed up and said she was lost already. Despite this, Rio still warned Sensei about the dangers that Aris would bring. But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.
desc.jp: Rio showed up and said she was lost already. Despite this, Rio still warned Sensei about the dangers that Aris would bring. But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. desc.zh_tw: 莉央出現，表示自己已經輸了。儘管如此，莉央仍然試圖警告老師愛麗絲將會帶來的危險，但老師認為莉央的舉動仍過於魯莽，不與他人討論而自主行動，與陽葵的意思基本一致。千尋此時也確認了愛麗絲的具體位置，三人立刻將愛麗絲救了出來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉央仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉央的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与日鞠的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉央仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉央的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与阳葵的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Aris' personality was isolated in deep databases by Key, and it was Key acting right now. Key disconnected the comm and hacked Eridu, trying to make the city for her use; the army of Divi: Sion started gathering within the city. Rio apologized for her doings, and wanted Sensei to leave before Key finished it. Rio tried to stop it on her own. At that urgent moment, Yuuka intervened just in time and disconnected the power of Key, forcing it to stop.

Key disconnected the comm and hacked Eridu, trying to make the city for her use; the army of Divi: Sion started gathering within the city. Rio apologized for her doings, and wanted Sensei to leave before Key finished it. Rio tried to stop it on her own. At that urgent moment, Yuuka intervened just in time and disconnected the power of Key, forcing it to stop.

Rio apologized for her doings, and wanted Sensei to leave before Key finished it. Rio tried to stop it on her own. At that urgent moment, Yuuka intervened just in time and disconnected the power of Key, forcing it to stop.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲的人格被Key隔離在深層資料庫中，當前是Key正在行使職責。Key斷開了通訊訊號，併入侵了Eridu，試圖為其所用；Divi:Sion的兵力也開始集中在都市中。莉央為自己的所作所為道歉，要求老師在Key得逞前離開，試圖以自己阻止一切過程。就在千鈞一髮之際，優香等人及時插手斷開了電源，Key發生錯誤而無法得逞。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝的人格被Key隔离在深层数据库中，当前是Key正在行使职责。Key断开了通讯信号，并入侵了Eridu，试图为其所用；Divi:Sion的兵力也开始集中在都市中。莉央为自己的所作所为道歉，要求老师在Key得逞前离开，试图以自己阻止一切过程。就在千钧一发之际，优香等人及时插手断开了电源，Key发生错误而无法得逞。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝的人格被Key隔离在深层数据库中，当前是Key正在行使职责。Key断开了通讯信号，并入侵了Eridu，试图为其所用；Divi:Sion的兵力也开始集中在都市中。莉央为自己的所作所为道歉，要求老师在Key得逞前离开，试图以自己阻止一切过程。就在千钧一发之际，优香等人及时插手断开了电源，Key发生错误而无法得逞。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝的人格被Key隔离在深层数据库中，当前是Key正在行使职责。Key断开了通讯信号，并入侵了Eridu，试图为其所用；Divi:Sion的兵力也开始集中在都市中。莉央为自己的所作所为道歉，要求老师在Key得逞前离开，试图以自己阻止一切过程。就在千钧一发之际，优香等人及时插手断开了电源，Key发生错误而无法得逞。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.ko: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.zh_tw: 在優香和乃愛的協助下，遊戲開發部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正當工程師部和貝里塔斯等抵禦來自各地的敵人之際。桃井、綠、柚子、老師企圖在陽葵的協助下喚醒愛麗絲，於是便進入了愛麗絲的精神世界。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在优香和诺亚的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程师部和贝里塔斯等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃井、绿、柚子、老师企图在日鞠的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在优香和乃爱的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程师部和贝里塔斯等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃井、绿、柚子、老师企图在阳葵的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在优香和乃爱的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程师部和贝里塔斯等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃井、绿、柚子、老师企图在阳葵的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。

desc.en: Rio explained that Yuuka didn't feel good after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka scolded Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.jp: Rio explained that Yuuka didn't feel good after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka scolded Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.thai: Rio explained that Yuuka didn't feel good after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka scolded Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.ko: Rio explained that Yuuka didn't feel good after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka scolded Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.zh_tw: 乃愛解釋稱，優香覺得不插手總感覺哪裡不對，於是前來協助。優香呵斥了莉央，說明會嚴厲追究她的責任。工程部此時也準備就緒，帶上了改裝好的前衛君MK.2前來協助。Key重啟系統，開始重新確保資源並將兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前衛君和工程師部干擾。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 诺亚解释称，优香觉得不插手总感觉哪里不对，于是前来协助。优香呵斥了莉央，说明会严厉追究她的责任。工程部此时也准备就绪，带上了改装好的前卫君MK.2前来协助。Key重启系统，开始重新确保资源并将兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前卫君和工程师部干扰。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: When Key still thought she had a chance, Himari appeared suddenly. She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.
desc.jp: When Key still thought she had a chance, Himari appeared suddenly. She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.

desc.zh_tw: 在Key以為仍有機會時，陽葵突然出現並解釋C&C和英美已經將入口堵上，Key無法召集兵力進入高塔。莉央驚訝於陽葵竟未逃走，而陽葵則表示早已對此有所預料。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在Key以为仍有机会时，日鞠突然出现并解释C&C和艾米已经将入口堵上，Key无法召集兵力进入高塔。莉央惊讶于日鞠竟未逃走，而日鞠则表示早已对此有所预料。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在Key以为仍有机会时，阳葵突然出现并解释C&C和英美已经将入口堵上，Key无法召集兵力进入高塔。莉央惊讶于阳葵竟未逃走，而阳葵则表示早已对此有所预料。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在Key以为仍有机会时，阳葵突然出现并解释C&C和英美已经将入口堵上，Key无法召集兵力进入高塔。莉央惊讶于阳葵竟未逃走，而阳葵则表示早已对此有所预料。

desc.en: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started creating a tunnel.
desc.jp: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started creating a tunnel.

desc.ko: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started creating a tunnel.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵指出在當前狀態下Key有可能會徹底接管愛麗絲的人格，因而目前的最佳方案應當是將愛麗絲喚醒。至於如何喚醒，陽葵提出讓遊戲開發部和老師一起潛入機器的意識和資料庫中，在那找回愛麗絲。莉央指出了其中的危險，但眾人義無反顧；在千年幾乎全部有生作戰力量的保護下，陽葵開始尋找其中的突破口。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管爱丽丝的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将爱丽丝唤醒。至于如何唤醒，日鞠提出让游戏开发部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回爱丽丝。莉央指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，日鞠开始寻找其中的突破口。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管爱丽丝的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将爱丽丝唤醒。至于如何唤醒，阳葵提出让游戏开发部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回爱丽丝。莉央指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，阳葵开始寻找其中的突破口。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳葵指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管爱丽丝的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将爱丽丝唤醒。至于如何唤醒，阳葵提出让游戏开发部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回爱丽丝。莉央指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，阳葵开始寻找其中的突破口。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei finally find Aris. Calling herself a demon lord, Aris is hesitant to return for fear of hurting others. Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and Sensei finally find Aris. Calling herself a demon lord, Aris is hesitant to return for fear of hurting others. Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.

Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部和老師終於遇見愛麗絲了。愛麗絲說自己是魔王，自己會害大家受傷，因此猶豫是否該回去。但大家都說自己才是自己真正的主人，於是愛麗絲終於拔出了勇者的證明「光之劍：Supernova」。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部和老师终于遇见爱丽丝了。爱丽丝说自己是魔王，自己会害大家受伤，因此犹豫是否该回去。但大家都说自己才是自己真正的主人，于是爱丽丝终于拔出了勇者的证明「光之剑：Supernova」。

desc.en: Sensei ang the GDD arrived at the Aris' deep consciousness, and there they met Aris and Key. The GDD wanted to bring back Aris, but Key appeared suddenly and reminded "princess" of what she had witnessed.
desc.jp: Sensei ang the GDD arrived at the Aris' deep consciousness, and there they met Aris and Key. The GDD wanted to bring back Aris, but Key appeared suddenly and reminded "princess" of what she had witnessed.

desc.zh_tw: 老師和遊戲開發部一行人來到了愛麗絲的意識深處，在那他們見到了愛麗絲與Key。開發部想要帶愛麗絲回去，但Key突然出現，並重新提醒“公主”她所見到的一切。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师和游戏开发部一行人来到了爱丽丝的意识深处，在那他们见到了爱丽丝与Key。开发部想要带爱丽丝回去，但Key突然出现，并重新提醒“公主”她所见到的一切。

desc.en: On screen, it showed scenes of C&C being besieged by AMAS, Neru confronting Toki, Sensei and others confronting Avant Guard but short on hands, Neru collapsing after being serverly inflicted - nothing but all their combat scenes. Everyone didn't understand why, but Key said that the "princess" knew it herself.
desc.jp: On screen, it showed scenes of C&C being besieged by AMAS, Neru confronting Toki, Sensei and others confronting Avant Guard but short on hands, Neru collapsing after being serverly inflicted - nothing but all their combat scenes. Everyone didn't understand why, but Key said that the "princess" knew it herself.

desc.zh_tw: 畫面上出現了被AMAS圍攻的C&C、與時對峙的寧瑠、面對前衛君不知所措的老師眾人、寧瑠負傷嚴重倒下的情景——都是他們戰鬥的身影。眾人不解畫面的內容，而Key則故作簡單的表示，“公主”自己知道這一切。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与时对峙的尼禄、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、尼禄负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与时对峙的宁瑠、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、宁瑠负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。

desc.en: Aris thought about Rio. Aris still held no doubts against the fact that she was in fact a "demon lord", and feared that she would inflict damages over everyone. She remembered the damage she inflicted on Momoi, the scenes of Midori and Yuzu confronting Rio, and Neru being injured - all was caused by herself, and so she should disappear.
desc.jp: Aris thought about Rio. Aris still held no doubts against the fact that she was in fact a "demon lord", and feared that she would inflict damages over everyone. She remembered the damage she inflicted on Momoi, the scenes of Midori and Yuzu confronting Rio, and Neru being injured - all was caused by herself, and so she should disappear.

She remembered the damage she inflicted on Momoi, the scenes of Midori and Yuzu confronting Rio, and Neru being injured - all was caused by herself, and so she should disappear.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲想起了莉央。愛麗絲仍對自己是個“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己會再次給大家造成傷害。她記得自己給桃井造成的傷害，柚子和綠面對莉央時的情形，以及寧瑠前輩負傷的畫面——而這全都是她自己造成的，也因此她應當消失。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝想起了莉央。爱丽丝仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃井造成的伤害，柚子和绿面对莉央时的情形，以及尼禄前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝想起了莉央。爱丽丝仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃井造成的伤害，柚子和绿面对莉央时的情形，以及宁瑠前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.ko: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Momoi suddenly mentioned TSC2 produced by everyone and its achievements like winning the Millenium Prize. Momoi didn't believe Aris' sayings, but she believed these facts, believed that Aris was not like that, and stressed the role of Aris in the team. Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero", they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.
desc.jp: Momoi suddenly mentioned TSC2 produced by everyone and its achievements like winning the Millenium Prize. Momoi didn't believe Aris' sayings, but she believed these facts, believed that Aris was not like that, and stressed the role of Aris in the team. Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero", they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.

Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero", they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.
desc.ko: Momoi suddenly mentioned TSC2 produced by everyone and its achievements like winning the Millenium Prize. Momoi didn't believe Aris' sayings, but she believed these facts, believed that Aris was not like that, and stressed the role of Aris in the team. Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero", they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井突然提到了愛麗絲與大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斬獲了千年大賞的種種成就。桃井不相信愛麗絲說的話，但她相信這些事實，相信愛麗絲絕非如此，強調了愛麗絲在團隊中的作用。愛麗絲仍對所有人來拯救她而不解，而柚子則一針見血的指了出來：愛麗絲自己都說過，勇者絕不會放棄同伴。同時他們還提到，無論是魔王還是勇者都只是稱號與頭銜，真正想成為誰只有愛麗絲能決定。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井突然提到了爱丽丝与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千年大赏的种种成就。桃井不相信爱丽丝说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信爱丽丝绝非如此，强调了爱丽丝在团队中的作用。爱丽丝仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：爱丽丝自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有爱丽丝能决定。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。
desc.zh_tw: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).

desc.en: Everyone wanted to hear Aris' own words. Being accused as a "demon lord", Aris thought that she would not be able to return to the club, to live and go out adventures with others - but Sensei denied it. Aris hesitated a little, said that she wanted to be a hero, that dream of continuing adventures with GDD and Sensei. Everyone agreed and just said: "Of course. Because we are the Game Development Department!"

desc.zh_tw: 大家都想聽聽愛麗絲的真心話。愛麗絲因自己已經被冠以“魔王”的身份，自己認定自己無法再回到社團、與大家冒險生活——但老師否定了這一點。愛麗絲猶豫了一下，說出自己也想成為勇者，與遊戲開發部和老師將冒險繼續下去的夢想。而眾人則表示——“因為我們可是，遊戲開發部啊！”
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家都想听听爱丽丝的真心话。爱丽丝因自己已经被冠以“魔王”的身份，自己认定自己无法再回到社团、与大家冒险生活——但老师否定了这一点。爱丽丝犹豫了一下，说出自己也想成为勇者，与游戏开发部和老师将冒险继续下去的梦想。而众人则表示——“因为我们可是，游戏开发部啊！”
desc.zh_cn_tw: 大家都想听听爱丽丝的真心话。爱丽丝因自己已经被冠以“魔王”的身份，自己认定自己无法再回到社团、与大家冒险生活——但老师否定了这一点。爱丽丝犹豫了一下，说出自己也想成为勇者，与游戏开发部和老师将冒险继续下去的梦想。而众人则表示——“因为我们可是，游戏开发部啊！”
desc.zh_cn_cn: 大家都想听听爱丽丝的真心话。爱丽丝因自己已经被冠以“魔王”的身份，自己认定自己无法再回到社团、与大家冒险生活——但老师否定了这一点。爱丽丝犹豫了一下，说出自己也想成为勇者，与游戏开发部和老师将冒险继续下去的梦想。而众人则表示——“因为我们可是，游戏开发部啊！”

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.

desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: Encouraged by everyone, Aris pulled out the Sword of Light stuck in the stone, returning to be a hero. Key looked at Aris in astonishment, hoping that Aris could perform her duties as the "princess". Aris didn't listen, and blew up Key with her Sword of Light.
desc.jp: Encouraged by everyone, Aris pulled out the Sword of Light stuck in the stone, returning to be a hero. Key looked at Aris in astonishment, hoping that Aris could perform her duties as the "princess". Aris didn't listen, and blew up Key with her Sword of Light.

desc.ko: Encouraged by everyone, Aris pulled out the Sword of Light stuck in the stone, returning to be a hero. Key looked at Aris in astonishment, hoping that Aris could perform her duties as the "princess". Aris didn't listen, and blew up Key with her Sword of Light.
desc.zh_tw: 受到眾人鼓勵的愛麗絲拔出了在石頭中的光之劍，重新迴歸勇者身份。Key極其驚愕地看著愛麗絲，希望愛麗絲能夠行使作為“王女”的職責，但愛麗絲沒聽，用光之劍一炮轟了Key。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 受到众人鼓励的爱丽丝拔出了在石头中的光之剑，重新回归勇者身份。Key极其惊愕地看着爱丽丝，希望爱丽丝能够行使作为“王女”的职责，但爱丽丝没听，用光之剑一炮轰了Key。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: As Key was suppressed in Aris' consciousness, the Divi: Sion army in the city began to disappear, and the Eridu control center was back at normal. Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.
desc.jp: As Key was suppressed in Aris' consciousness, the Divi: Sion army in the city began to disappear, and the Eridu control center was back at normal. Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.

Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.
desc.zh_tw: 由於愛麗絲意識中的Key被壓制，城中的Divi:Sion軍隊開始消失，Eridu控制中心也恢復正常。莉央驚訝於老師等人居然真的做到了，而老師只是輕描淡寫地表示這是遊戲開發部所能做到的。最終，遊戲開發部三人與愛麗絲團聚。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于爱丽丝意识中的Key被压制，城中的Divi:Sion军队开始消失，Eridu控制中心也恢复正常。莉央惊讶于老师等人居然真的做到了，而老师只是轻描淡写地表示这是游戏开发部所能做到的。最终，游戏开发部三人与爱丽丝团聚。

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.

desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.jp: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.thai: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.ko: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.zh_tw: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不見，C&C則迎接新成員，遊戲開發部再次開始研發下一部作品。千年再次恢復和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。

desc.zh_tw: 陽葵向老師表示，Eridu已經封存，後事將由她進行負責。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠向老师表示，Eridu已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳葵向老师表示，Eridu已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。

desc.en: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.jp: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.thai: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.ko: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央在此事後決定卸任會長一職，優香大為震撼。會長走前只留下了一條“對不起”的紙條。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。

desc.en: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.jp: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.thai: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.ko: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.zh_tw: C&C邀請了老師前來參加聚會，慶祝部長寧瑠康復出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎裝的主意。季因為會長失蹤，所以也來參加了聚會，併成為C&C的一員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长尼禄康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。时因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长宁瑠康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。季因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。

desc.en: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.
desc.jp: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.
desc.thai: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.
desc.ko: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.
desc.zh_tw: 老師被叫到了遊戲開發部，眾人表示老師正在開發一款新的遊戲，因為之前的那個無法繼續擴充套件思路。愛麗絲邀請老師一起嘗試，眾人在愉快的氛圍下開始了遊戲。故事仍在續寫中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation firm "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]

desc.zh_tw: 【此處為過場影片播放，背景音樂為遊戲部短篇動畫《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由於影片中的圖片素材大多在遊戲記憶體在，因而背景一欄將盡量給出具體的圖片】
desc.zh_cn_jp: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】
